sections.name: Breakfast & Pastry
sections.subtitle: Our selected menu's to start your day

items.name: Chicken Creamy Rosemary with Croissant
items.descriptionId:
ayam yang dimasak dengan rosemary dan saus rempah yang creamy disajikan
bersama croissant.
items.descriptionEn:
chicken cooked with rosemary and a creamy spice sauce served with a
croissant.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.descriptionId:
campuran lettuce, selada romaine, salada, tomat ceri, smoked beef dan telur
rebus disajikan dengan dressing caesar, parmesan dan crouton
items.descriptionEn:
a mixture of romaine, lettuce, salada, baby tomatoes, smoked beef and boiled
 eggs with caesar dressings, parmesan and crouton

items.name: French Toast
items.descriptionId: roti panggang ala Perancis dengan topping krim vanilla dan bubuk coklat
items.descriptionEn: a toast in french style topped with vanilla cream and cocoa powder

items.name: Ice Cream Waffle
items.descriptionId: wafel yang disajikan dengan es krim vanilla, irisan buah strawberry dan sirup mapel
items.descriptionEn: a waffle served with vanilla ice cream, sliced strawberry and maple syrup

sections.name: Food
sections.subtitle: Hearty dishes of Main Course, Kids Meal, Pasta, & Snacks

items.name: Mi Goreng
items.descriptionId: mi goreng kecap dengan isian ayam, telur orak arik dan sayuran disajikan bersama taburan bawang goreng, acar dan kerupuk.
items.descriptionEn: Indonesian fried noodles cooked with chicken, scrambled eggs and vegetables served with a sprinkle of fried shallot, pickles and crackers.

items.name: Sop Buntut
items.descriptionId: sup kaldu bening berisi buntut sapi, wortel, kentang dan tomat disajikan bersama nasi, emping dan sambal.
items.descriptionEn: a clear broth oxtail soup served with rice, gnemon seed crackers and sambal.

items.name: Beef Butter Rice
items.descriptionId:
nasi yang dimasak dengan butter disajikan bersama irisan smoked brisket beef
bumbu blackpepper dan telur orak-arik.
items.descriptionEn:
rice cooked in butter served with blackpepper smoked brisket beef slice and
scrambled egg.

items.name: Nasi Goreng Kampung
items.descriptionId:
nasi goreng dengan bumbu khas, ayam dan sayuran disajikan bersama telur mata
sapi, acar dan kerupuk.
items.descriptionEn:
Indonesian fried rice cooked with special spices, chicken and vegetables served with
sunny side up eggs, pickles and crackers.

items.name: Nasi Garang Asem
items.descriptionId:
olahan ayam bersantan yang dimasak dengan daun pisang ini punya cita rasa pedas,
gurih dan asam disajikan bersama nasi dan emping.
items.descriptionEn:
a coconut milk chicken dish cooked in banana leaves has a spicy, savory and sour
taste served with rice and gnemon seed crackers.

items.name: Chicken Creamy Mushroom
items.descriptionId:
pan seared ﬁllet paha ayam yang disajikan dengan saus jamur, brokoli, kentang
goreng crinkle cut.
items.descriptionEn:
pan seared chicken thigh ﬁllet served with mushroom sauce, broccoli and crinkle cut
fries.

items.name: Nasi Goreng Cabe Hijau
items.descriptionId:
nasi goreng dengan bumbu cabai hijau, ayam dan sayuran disajikan bersama telur
mata sapi, acar dan kerupuk.
items.descriptionEn:
Indonesian fried rice cooked with green chilies spices, chicken and vegetables
served with sunny side up eggs, pickles and crackers.

items.name: Nasi Sop Merah
items.descriptionId: nasi putih yang disajikan bersama sop merah dengan isian wortel, ayam dan sosis.
items.descriptionEn:
Indonesian tomato (red) soup ﬁlled with carrots, chicken and sausage served with
steamed rice.

items.name: Tenderloin Steak
items.descriptionId: bagian daging sapi yang lembut dipanggang dan disajikan dengan saus mushroom/black pepper, mashed potato, dan simple salad.
items.descriptionEn:
tender beef cutlet grilled and served with mushroom/black pepper sauce, mashed
potatoes, and simple salad.

items.name: Nasi Goreng Kecombrang
items.descriptionId:
nasi goreng dengan bumbu kecombrang dan sayuran disajikan bersama sate ayam
berbumbu, telur mata sapi, acar dan kerupuk.
items.descriptionEn:
Indonesian fried rice cooked with torch ginger spices and vegetables served with
chicken skewer, sunny side up eggs, pickles and crackers.

items.name: Curry Katsu Rice
items.descriptionId:
nasi yang disajikan bersama kari khas jepang, ayam goreng tepung panko dan
taburan nori ﬂakes.
items.descriptionEn:
a Japanese curry served with breaded fried chicken and steamed rice with a nori
ﬂakes on top.

items.name: Chicken Cordon Bleu
items.descriptionId:
ayam ﬁllet gulung isi smoked beef dan keju disajikan dengan saus gravy, brokoli dan
kentang.
items.descriptionEn:
rolled chicken ﬁllet ﬁlled with smoked beef and cheese served with gravy, broccoli
and potatoes.

items.name: Rabbit
items.descriptionId: paket makan anak berisi nasi sop merah, buah-buahan dan susu kotak.
items.descriptionEn: kids meal package containing sop merah with rice, fruits and milk.

items.name: Bear
items.descriptionId: paket makan anak berisi fettucine carbonara, buah-buahan dan susu kotak.
items.descriptionEn: kids meal package containing fettucine carbonara, fruits and milk.

items.name: Giraffe
items.descriptionId: paket makan anak berisi curry katsu rice, buah-buahan dan susu kotak.
items.descriptionEn: kids meal package containing curry katsu rice, fruits and milk.

items.name: Pasta Bayam
items.descriptionId:
pasta penne yang dimasak dengan saus creamy dan bayam disajikan dengan taburan
parsley, irisan baguette dan parmesan.
items.descriptionEn:
penne pasta cooked with creamy sauce and spinach served with a sprinkle of
parsley, sliced baguette and parmesan.

items.name: Fettuccine Carbonara
items.descriptionId:
pasta fettucini dengan saus creamy, jamur champignon, dan smoked beef disajikan
dengan taburan parsley, irisan baguette dan parmesan.
items.descriptionEn:
fettuccine pasta with creamy sauce, champignon mushrooms and smoked beef
served with a sprinkle of parsley, sliced baguette and parmesan.

items.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
items.descriptionId:
spaghetti yang dimasak dengan saus berbahan dasar daging ala Italia disajikan
dengan taburan parsley dan irisan baguette.
items.descriptionEn:
spaghetti pasta cooked with bolognese sauce served with a sprinkle of parsley and
sliced baguette.

items.name: Spaghetti Aglio Olio Tuna
items.descriptionId:
spaghetti yang dimasak dengan bawang putih, cabai dan tuna disajikan bersama
taburan parsley dan irisan baguette
items.descriptionEn:
spaghetti pasta cooked with garlic, chili pepper and tuna served with a sprinkle of
parsley and sliced baguette.

items.name: Banana Ubee Frites
items.descriptionId: pisang goreng wijen dan ubi madu goreng disajikan dengan saus karamel
items.descriptionEn: fried banana and fried sweet potato served with caramel sauce.

items.name: French Fries
items.descriptionId: kentang goreng dengan bumbu spesial, taburan parsley dan saus sambal.
items.descriptionEn: special seasoned shoestring fries with sprinkle of parsley and chili sauce.

items.name: Marshmallow Soft Cookies
items.descriptionId: kukis bertekstur lembut dengan marshmallow diatasnya.
items.descriptionEn: soft textured cookies with marshmallows on top.

items.name: Cinnamon Donut
items.descriptionId: donat kentang bertabur bubuk gula kayu manis.
items.descriptionEn: fried donuts topped with cinnamon sugar powder.

items.name: Bitterbalen
items.descriptionId:
kroket bulat mini tanpa kentang yang berisi smoked beef dan keju disajikan dengan
taburan parsley dan saus sambal.
items.descriptionEn:
deep fried dutch meatballs ﬁlled with smoked beef and cheese, served with sprinkle
of parsley and chili sauce.

items.name: Matcha Cookie Bomb
items.descriptionId: soft cookie isi saus matcha dengan topping es krim.
items.descriptionEn: soft cookies ﬁlled with matcha sauce and ice cream topping.

items.name: Calamari
items.descriptionId:
cumi goreng tepung berbentuk cincin yang disajikan dengan taburan parsley dan
saus sambal.
items.descriptionEn: calamari fritters served with a sprinkle of parsley and chili sauce.

items.name: Crispy Platter
items.descriptionId: paket snack berisi crispy enoki, ekado, dan ebi furai disajikan bersama saus sambal.
items.descriptionEn:
a platter that contained crispy enoki, money bag fried dumplings and ebi furai served
with chili sauce.

items.name: Blueberry Crumble Cheesecake
items.descriptionId: cheesecake dengan campuran blueberry dan crumble yang renyah.
items.descriptionEn: cheesecake with a crispy mix of blueberries and crumble.

items.name: Potato Wedges
items.descriptionId: kentang goreng tebal dengan taburan parsley disajikan bersama saus sambal.
items.descriptionEn: deep fried potato wedges served with a sprinkle of parsley and chili sauce.

items.name: Cinnamon Cruller
items.descriptionId:
pastry sejenis choux yang digoreng, ditabur gula kayu manis, dan disajikan dengan saus
coklat.
items.descriptionEn: a fried choux pastry, sprinkled with cinnamon sugar, and served with chocolate sauce.

sections.name: Beverage
sections.subtitle: From bold brews to gentle refreshers

items.name: Fruity Bomb
items.descriptionId:
longblack cold brew espresso dengan rasa
buah mangga dan peach.
items.descriptionEn:
a long black cold brew espresso with mango
and peach ﬂavor.

items.name: Senja +
items.descriptionId:
es kopi susu gula aren signature dari Kedai
Latar 1.0
items.descriptionEn: signature iced coffee with milk and palm sugar from Kedai Latar 1.0

items.name: Siang +
items.descriptionId:
es kopi susu ice cream blend signature dari
Kedai Latar 1.0
items.descriptionEn:
signature iced coffee with milk and ice cream
blend from Kedai Latar 1.0

items.name: Tiramisu
items.descriptionId:
es kopi susu dengan perpaduan dark
chocolate dan fresh espresso.
items.descriptionEn:
iced coffee milk with a blend of dark
chocolate and fresh espresso.

items.name: Butterscotch Creamy Latte
items.descriptionId: es kopi susu rasa manis gurih caramel butterscotch dengan topping cream dan remah biskuit.
items.descriptionEn: iced milk coffee with sweet and savory caramel butterscotch ﬂavor with cream and biscuit crumbs.

items.name: Not So Dirty Latte
items.descriptionId:
es kopi susu dengan fresh espresso dan
topping cream.
items.descriptionEn:
iced coffee milk with fresh espresso and
cream topping.

items.name: Espresso (hot)
items.descriptionId: shot kecil berwarna gelap dengan lapisan crema tipis di atasnya, aromanya kuat dan rasanya intens.
items.descriptionEn: a small, dark shot topped with a thin layer of crema, offering a strong aroma and intense flavor.

items.name: Americano (ice/hot)
items.descriptionId: espresso yang diseduh dengan air, menghasilkan rasa kopi yang ringan namun tetap berkarakter.
items.descriptionEn: espresso diluted with hot water, creating a lighter body while keeping its distinct coffee character.

items.name: Cappuccino (ice/hot)
items.descriptionId: espresso dengan susu dan foam lembut yang tebal di atasnya.
items.descriptionEn: espresso with steamed milk and a thick, soft layer of foam.

items.name: Latte (ice/hot)
items.descriptionId: espresso dengan susu yang lebih dominan, teksturnya halus dan rasanya lembut.
items.descriptionEn: espresso combined with more steamed milk, smooth in texture and gentle in flavor.

items.name: Magic (hot)
items.descriptionId: perpaduan double ristretto dan susu steamed yang menghasilkan rasa kopi intens dengan tekstur lembut.
items.descriptionEn: a blend of double ristretto and steamed milk, delivering an intense coffee flavor with a smooth texture.

items.name: Manual Brew
items.descriptionId: Seduhan kopi manual metode pour over yang menghadirkan rasa kopi  lebih bersih dan ringan.
items.descriptionEn:
manual coffee brewing using the pour over method which produces a cleaner and lighter coffee taste.

served in V60 / Japanese Style
*Ask the barista for the beans line up ;)

items.name: Majestic Rose
items.descriptionId:
minuman bersoda rasa earl grey, lemon dan
bunga mawar.
items.descriptionEn:
a ﬁzzy mocktail with earl grey, lemon and
rose ﬂavors.

items.name: Orange Blast
items.descriptionId:
minuman segar dengan campuran rasa jeruk,
apel dan bunga sakura.
items.descriptionEn:
non-soda mocktail with a mixture of orange,
apple and cherry blossom ﬂavors.

items.name: Purple Haze
items.descriptionId:
minuman segar dengan campuran rasa 
anggur, lemon dan bunga lavender.
items.descriptionEn:
non-soda mocktail with a mixture of grape,
lemon and lavender ﬂavors.

items.name: Nastar
items.descriptionId:
minuman segar dengan sensasi rasa kukis
nastar.
items.descriptionEn: a refreshing drink with the sensation of nastar cookie taste.

items.name: Kopyor
items.descriptionId: minuman segar dengan sensasi rasa es kopyor dengan es krim.
items.descriptionEn: a refreshing drink with the sensation of the taste of kopyor (coconut drink) with ice cream.

items.name: Sourcandy
items.descriptionId:
Minuman bersoda dengan rasa permen 
asam manis.
items.descriptionEn:
a ﬁzzy mocktail with a sweet and sour
candy ﬂavor.

items.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
items.descriptionId:
minuman susu dengan sensasi rasa kue
strawberry cheesecake.
items.descriptionEn:
a milk-based drink that gives a sensation
of the taste of strawberry cheesecake.

items.name: Cookies & Cream
items.descriptionId:
minuman rasa biskuit dan krim dengan
topping remah biskuit diatasnya.
items.descriptionEn:
A ﬂavored cookies and cream drinks
topped with cookies crumble.

items.name: Tsukiji Matcha Creamy
items.descriptionId:
minuman rasa matcha dengan topping
cheese cream
items.descriptionEn: a matcha drink with cheese cream on top.

items.name: Creamy Pistachio
items.descriptionId:
minuman susu rasa pistachio dengan
cheese cream.
items.descriptionEn:
a pistachio ﬂavored milk-based drink
topped with cheese cream.

items.name: Sweet Cloudy
items.descriptionId:
minuman susu rasa nougat vanilla dengan
cream dan marshmallow diatasnya.
items.descriptionEn:
A vanilla nougat ﬂavored milk-based drink
topped with cream and marshmallow.

items.name: Terang Bulan
items.descriptionId:
minuman susu yang memberikan sensasi
rasa jajanan terang bulan (martabak manis).
items.descriptionEn:
a milk-based drink that gives a sensation
of the taste of sweet martabak.

items.name: Matcha Frappe
items.descriptionId:
Minuman yang terbuat dari matcha dan
susu.
items.descriptionEn: A drink made from matcha and milk.

items.name: Beauty Berries
items.descriptionId:
campuran buah beri, pisang, yoghurt, es
krim, susu dan stevia.
items.descriptionEn:
mix berries, banana, yoghurt, ice cream
and milk with stevia sweetener.

items.name: Yellow Sunshine
items.descriptionId: campuran dari buah markisa, mangga, yoghurt, es krim, susu dan stevia.
items.descriptionEn:
passion fruit, mango, yoghurt, ice cream
and milk with stevia sweetener.

items.name: Tropical Twist
items.descriptionId:
campuran dari buah peach, nanas,
yoghurt, es krim, susu dan stevia.
items.descriptionEn:
peach, pineapple, yoghurt, ice cream and
milk with stevia sweetener.

items.name: Summertime
items.descriptionId:
campuran buah beri, buah naga, yoghurt,
leci, es krim, susu dan stevia.
items.descriptionEn:
mix berries, dragon fruit, yoghurt, lychee,
ice cream and milk with stevia sweetener.
